channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Woman rescues a beached shark in Oregon
item.description: A woman walking her dogs on a beach near Portland, Oregon, found a small shark struggling in a tidepool

item.title: 'No hire' job market leaves unemployed in limbo as threats to economy multiply
item.description: The unemployment rate is low and the economy is still growing, but those out of work face the slowest pace of hiring in more than a decade

item.title: Trump administration announces 17th deadly strike on an alleged drug boat
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth has announced another deadly U.S. strike on a boat he said was trafficking narcotics in the Caribbean Sea

item.title: New Mormon apostle led a global temple building boom and has deep knowledge of church finances
item.description: A high-ranking official in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints who oversaw its finances and a global temple building boom has been chosen ...

item.title: Crews are working to fix Alaska Native villages devastated by flooding. But will residents return?
item.description: Crews are working to repair remote Alaska Native villages that were devastated by the remnants of a typhoon last month
